page.title: ChatSage Bot Commands
page.expandTip: Click any command row below to expand and see usage details.

ask.name: !ask / !sage
ask.description: Ask Sage a question. Uses search intelligently.

search.name: !search
search.description: Searches the web for information on a topic.

game.name: !game
game.description: Provides researched information about the game currently being played. Add "analyze" to use AI image recognition on the stream (uses Twitch thumbnail that updates every 5 minutes).

translate.name: !translate
translate.description: Manage automatic message translation for users.

help.name: !commands / !help
help.description: Shows where to find the list of available commands.

lurk.name: !lurk
lurk.description: Let the chat know you are lurking. Provide an optional reason for a custom send-off.

quote.name: !quote
quote.description: Add, view, or search quotes from the channel. Quotes are stored per-channel and can include an optional author attribution.

usage.idDesc: Shows quote by ID number, e.g. !quote 12
usage.lastDesc: Shows the most recently added quote
usage.searchDesc: Searches quotes by text or author, e.g. !quote parfait
usage.addDesc: Adds a new quote. Optional author after " - ", e.g. !quote add "hello world - parfait"

geo.name: !geo
geo.description: Starts or manages Geo-Game, a geography guessing game for IRL or virtual worlds.

usage.region: Starts a region-specific real-world game, e.g. !geo Japan
usage.game: Starts a game-world game using current stream's game
usage.gameTitle: Starts a game-world game with specified game, e.g. !geo game "Metroid Prime"
usage.rounds: Runs any game command with N rounds, e.g. !geo Japan 3
usage.stop: Game initiator, mods, or broadcaster can stop
usage.interval: Sets time between clues to 30-300 seconds
usage.configRegion: Sets regions like Europe,Asia or USA,Canada

riddle.name: !riddle
riddle.description: Starts or manages a Riddle game. Riddles can be general, about the current stream game, or a specific subject.

usage.subject: Example: !riddle animals
usage.game: Riddle about the current stream game
usage.stop: Game initiator, mods, or broadcaster can stop
usage.questionTime: Sets time per riddle to 15-120 seconds
usage.keywordsLimit: Sets recent keywords to exclude, e.g. 20-100

trivia.name: !trivia
trivia.description: Starts or manages Trivia games with factual questions on various topics, including the current stream game.

usage.game: Starts trivia about the current stream game
usage.stop: Game initiator, mods, or broadcaster can stop
usage.time: Sets time per question to 10-120 seconds

botlang.name: !botlang
botlang.description: Configure the bot to speak in a specific language for the entire channel.

usage.status: Shows current auto-chat mode, frequency, and categories
usage.freq: Sets minimum gap between auto messages (minutes)

disable.name: !disable
disable.description: Disables a command in this channel.

enable.name: !enable
enable.description: Enables a previously disabled command in this channel.

ping.name: !ping
ping.description: Checks if the bot is responsive. Responds with Pong!

streamIntegration.title: Stream Integration:
streamIntegration.desc: Monitor current game, title, and stream information

commandControl.title: Command Control:
commandControl.desc: Enable/disable specific commands and set custom responses

analytics.title: Analytics:
analytics.desc: View bot usage statistics and interaction patterns

authorize.title: Authorize:
